value.title: Create Slope Chart (KPI) using Charticulator and using in Power BI
value.excerpt: This another my investigation on creating a custom visual using Charticulator. I created a Slope Chart that can be used as a KPI visual to measure the trend of a specific group in two different scales. value.title: PowerBI Tips Introducing Custom Visuals Gallery
value.excerpt: It's 2019 and a good time for another great tool for Power BI.  I'm proud to announce the release of the Custom Visuals Gallery and Charts Building tool.    Gallery (Download Free Visualization Files) http://gallery.powerbi.tips  Charts (Free no code solution to building visualizations) http://charts.powerbi.tips
